_meanings:
{@--1@} Sinking, fainting, 
sitting down; <ls>Ki. 18. 47</ls>; {#anavasAdaH#}
safety, protection; failure, as of the
voice.

{@--2@} Ruin, loss, destruction,
decline; {#paryAyajayAvasAdA#} <ls>Ki. 17. 18</ls>;
{#vipadeti tAvadavasAdakarI#} <ls>Ki. 18. 23</ls>,  
<ls n="Ki.">6. 41</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">3. 38</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2.</ls>

{@--5@} (In law)
Badness of a cause, defeat, losing (a
cause); {#alaM svapakzAvasAdaSaMkayA#} <ls>M. 1.</ls>
